tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have had scans before too. But Dr. Srividya though I was late and though I hadn’t carried MA reports and above all MA Baby wasn’t co-operatin (Baby position wasn’t right) yet she tried her best. Though if has made me go back to her for a repeat scan I’m more than happy to do tht and I knw she tried her best. God bless u doc..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: She is very friendly and has more patience.she checks in very depth and makes patient relax.The reports she gives in a very understanding manner and we feel to talk her very easily

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I just loved doctor's friendly attitude who had a  lot of patience and politeness. I would strongly recommend her. Thank u so much mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She was very polite and friendly. Gave full time to understand all my queries and answered them all patiently.

tags: Wait time,
review: I booked an appointment at 10.00am on Dec 14th for my wife. We reached to Milan hospital at 10.10am. To our surprise, the receptionist told us that Dr will not be available today, instead we will appoint you to another doctor and asked us to come at 11.30am. This is very unprofessional, not showing up without informing. We book a particular time so that we can also manage our routine. And pregnancy tests has high importance where appropriate attention and care is required. If the doctor doesn't show up how come customers will have trust.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She s friendly with all patients . i wont feel it s a hospital .it gets homely feeling.her explanation regarding about our health issue can able to understand easily.

review: She did scan nicely. Actually baby was not taking position and I was also dehydrated so she gave me time and in third attempt it could be done and I could come home happily.

review: She is such a sweet lady. I will recommend her, for obstetric scans. She is confident, ************** gentle and very caring. I am very satisfied by her advice and trust her completely.

Shearing the information ecofriendly and treatment also very good . Regards timings good and related treatment feedback also good

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: she is really a good human being. She always treated me very nicely and elaborated everything whatever I wanted to know. I have seen my baby with her eyes first. I am so lucky that she was beside me throughout my pregnancy and had a really good memories with her. I strongly recommend her for pregnancy related scans.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to the hospital for infertility problem. Dr vyshnavi ma'am is gentle, friendly and very professional. I felt very much comfortable wid her . Loved the attention she gave us by listening to our health issues. She explained us about the treatment clearly. To be frank I got a positive hope by meeting vyshnavi maam. I strongly recommend the doctor now I am in 3rd month of pregnancy thank you Dr vyshnavo rao

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr. Srividhya is very patient and friendly. I went to Milann hospital for pregnancy checkups and scans were done by her. She is very professional and she takes care and hears you with very friendly manner.
She clears the doubts  and always have a smile on face which makes you very positive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Patient enough to explain well. Felt comfortable consulting will definitely recommend to others. ...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr Srividhya is so polite and patient. She always listens to your questions and clearly answers all our questions how much ever silly it may be.

I would strongly recommend her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She does a thorough USG scan , giving sufficient time. She also explains everything very much in detail and with patience. Very pleasing behaviour, evoking confidence in patients. Would recommend her for ante-natal USG scans.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very friendly doctor,good response,positive attitude. Her smile will cure you from Suffering. I wish all Doctors should have similar interests of treating.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was very good experience got  proper information  about the  scanning and  I  am  getting  proper treatment thank u
